trans-unit.source: Specifies what portion of the 3D scene is rendered by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport3DVisual"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 指定三维场景的哪些部分呈现通过<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Viewport3DVisual"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera.Transform%2A> property enables the Camera to be positioned, oriented, and animated independently of the camera's derived type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera.Transform%2A>属性使相机来定位、 面向，并且独立于的照相机的派生类型进行动画处理。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式的当前实例的值设置。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: -空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 使用的类型定义的默认格式<xref:System.IFormattable>实现。</xref:System.IFormattable>

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用于设置值的格式提供程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 来从操作系统的当前区域设置获取数字格式信息。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 指定的格式中的当前实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this object based on the current culture settings.
trans-unit.target: 创建基于当前区域性设置此对象的字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: String representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: 此对象表示形式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the Camera.
trans-unit.target: 创建的字符串表示形式相机。

trans-unit.source: Culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 区域性特定格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: String representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: 此对象表示形式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Transform3D applied to the camera.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用于照相机 Transform3D。

trans-unit.source: The Transform property is applied before the view and projection transforms specified by the camera.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的照相机的视图和投影转换前应用了转换属性。

trans-unit.source: The actual transform that is applied is the inverse of the specified Transform property, because transforming the camera is equivalent to transforming the world in the opposite direction.
trans-unit.target: 应用的实际转换是的反向属性指定的转换属性，因为转换相机相当于转换相反方向世界。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Transform3D applied to the camera.
trans-unit.target: Transform3D 应用于照相机。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera.Transform*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera.Transform*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Camera.Transform*>

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 |TransformProperty | |元数据标志 ||

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
